title: Software engineer - Technical Leader
description:
Project for GRDF (french natural gas distributor).
My role :
  • Work on the 6 mobile apps : 1 Android, 4 Windows mobile 6.5 and 1 windows 8.1
  • Analyze and fix issues detected by the functional teams.
  • Conception of new features to develop, and integrate them into the apps.
  • Handle the quality of the code and the apps' performance
  • Deal with web services and infrastructure constraints (Certificates, Datapower)
  • Carry out the continuous integration with jenkins hosted on virtual machines

title: Business Analyst
description: The aim was to improve the company transformation (agility) via a better synergy of company fundamentals: datas, business rules, processus and applications.
